title: Major: Yuujou no Winning Shot
alternative_title: 劇場版MAJOR 友情の一球（ウイニングショット）
description: Gorou briefly returns to Japan after a triumphant campaign in the US. He is heading towards Fukuoka where he played baseball when he was a fifth grader. Having just moved into a new town after leaving Mifune and his friends at the Dolphins, this is where Gorou faced a critical point in his life.
